## DateApiObject.dayOfMonth() method

Gets or sets day of month one based

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dayOfMonth(day?: number): DateApiObject<TDate> | number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  day | number | If specified, sets day of month |
